title: Reconnect Bug
body: Champion select had finished and the game was about to begin. The client minimized as it normally does and then the league game itself should have began to load. Instead the client popped back up after about 1 second and showed the reconnect button. Clicking the button would do nothing but minimize the window and have it pop back up again like before stated. I tried restarting my client to no success, and then after restarting my computer to see if it was a computer issue (it wasn't) and opening my client the game had been remade and thus a loss in my placements and a leaver penalty. Events like this really demoralize one from playing the game and should be fixed immediately.

replies.body: Hmmmm it sounds like something like firewalls or antivirus might have been blocking the loading screen from establishing a solid connection with the game servers. I'd like you to check those settings out really quickly and test it in a custom game if you don't mind. Try [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3), and let me know if they help out not!
I logged on today and got into a custom game and everything seems to have been resolved. Unfortunately the 2 "losses" are still on my record.
